name: LOA: Me And Angel
description:
English version will be updated soon

The World of Angels who follow the gods, There was a young angel named Etriel in that world.
Etriel was recommended to the Archangel by other angels for his great ability and character.
The Archangel test is in 30days, Etriel was confident.

But, Etriel had a huge disadvantage.
He had no experience with Guardian angels.
He wanted to be the great angel who had to take care of all the angels.
So, Etriel goes down to the human world for experience.

Meanwhile, In the town of Bree, a small town outside the kingdom of Bastea, lived a girl named Seira.
Bastea Kingdom had young men employed in wars because of a long war.

Seira is kind and active. So she is loved in the town.

Now, The angel Etriel and the human Seira will meet.

Game Features

  • Story-based game without battle
  • Various systems such as work part-time, cooking, collecting, etc.
  • Various events and event scenes
  • Hidden stories and multi endings
